description:
Sabrina Mary is http://anidb.net/ch12080 [Lag]`s aunt who lives in Campbell Litus and was trusted with Lag`s care since he was delivered to her at the age of 7 by http://anidb.net/ch12083 [Gauche Suede], the Letter Bee.
When Lag learns about his origins as a fragment of heart, Sabrina is revealed to be his real aunt, but a good friend of http://anidb.net/ch23314 [his mother], the current Empress.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Sabrina Mary
